comment.author: 이성기
comment.content: TD Bank 다운타운에서 사람을 모집하는 것입니다.

post.content:
Location: Toronto Start Date: asap Position Title: IT SOLUTIONS DEVELOPER (Full Time) Number of Positions: 1 Department Overview: The Compliance group within Corporate Technology Solutions is responsible for the delivery and support of the technology solutions for the Corporate Compliance business unit. The team services the projects and applications such as Branch Visit Reporting, Field Review Application, Compliance Issues and Events Management, and Legislative Compliance Management - ROAD applications.
We are seeking a Java Developer to work on various compliance projects. The candidate will be responsible for assisting with development of compliance related projects, fulfilling multiple roles from requirements gathering, architecting, coding and unit testing solutions.
Job Description: Perform analysis to support business strategies and initiatives Define, document and translate high level business requirements into system requirements specifications Support the IT project manager, providing input into the project plan and helping to identify and resolve issues in a timely manner
Work with IT management and the client to ensure effective communication, integration of project issues and deliverables, and clear articulation of business requirements
Performing analysis, design, programming and unit testing, following system development life cycle (SDLC) methodology while adhering to bank technology standards
Conducting and participating in code reviews Participating in the creation and review of SDLC documentation as required Contributing to team success by meeting key project milestones and overall project deliverables on time and within budget, while adhering to development and quality standards.
Develop or participate in development of test strategies, plans and scripts that adhere to business requirements, and participate in the testing of developed systems/solutions
Participate in knowledge transfer with the team and business units Develop effective solutions by researching/analyzing issues Work independently and interact with a small number of team members and a variety of other departments Adhere to standard Project Management (PMLC), Software Development Strong technical documentation skills Education/Accreditations: Other Qualifications/Skills/Experience: The candidate must possess the following: Strong analytical and problem solving skills Strong verbal and written communication skills Ability to effectively communicate technical issues to non-technical individuals Ability to work independently from functional specification Experience with SDLC methodologies Ability to work effectively in a team setting and in a fast paced environment Experience in the following technical skills/tools: Java and J2EE web development, web presentation experience (Servlets, JSP, HTML, JavaScript), Java (Hibernate), JSP Tag Libraries ,Spring, JSF, Jasper Reports, Tomcat, ANT, Oracle, SQL, RAD or WSAD IDE usage, Eclipse, Seam, Maven, Ajax, JSF, Spring, Crystal Reports, CVS, MKS, and Java Persistence Frameworks (JPA, Hibernate)
The following skills are an asset: Exposure to mainframe technologies is helpful Experience with JDBC, CVS is an asset Knowledge of TD ePlatform framework and Spring and Struts frameworks are a definite asset Experience with TD or other Financial Institution systems is helpful Kathy Pak Resource Manager Ajilon Consulting Phone: 416-941-5961 Toll-Free: 1-800-842-5907 x 4103 Fax: 416-366-2001 Email: kathy.pak@ajilon.com
post.title: Perm, Banking, Toronto - Int to Sr. Java
